creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: three dragonflies, two purple/blue, and one reddish-brown fly just above the surface of a calm body of water; a few green wisps of grasses or reeds at LLC, LRC and URC; water appears to reflect a blue sky with white clouds; lower portion of water is darker blue, upper portion is lighter blue
markings: LLC, in pencil: [41/150]; on back, LRC, in pencil: [320-3]
signed: LRC, in pencil: [Aikins]; bottom center, in pencil: [Tombo]
title: Tombo
